response.overview: Young bikers is a film based on road safety education. Film starts with a government official meeting regarding road safety which was covered by media and a media house head got an idea to make a TV show on Road safety. He manages to get connection with some young guys to make TV show and the name given to show is Young Bikers. During shootings and making of TV show a guy fell in love with a girl simultaneously during making of show road safety education were tought to viewers. A turn came when a young guy purchased a second hand bike for shooting and eventually bike was stolen one . when he comes to know about the fact of stolen bike all guys found him trapped in a foregery , finally they plan to trap culprits and make a plan with the help of police and media personnel and finally they win and culprits were sent behind bars .
response.title: Young Bikers
